benefits.title: A Meta-Analysis of β-glucan Effects on Lipids in Mildly Hypercholesterolemic Individuals
benefits.summary: Beta-glucan can significantly reduce risk factors like total cholesterol and LDL-c for cardiovascular disease in mildly hypercholesterolemic individuals.

benefits.title: Fungal beta-glucans and mammalian immunity.
benefits.summary: Beta-glucans possess immunomodulatory activities and have therapeutic benefits, particularly as anti-infective and antitumorigenic agents.

benefits.title: Oat Beta‐Glucan: Its Role in Health Promotion and Prevention of Diseases
benefits.summary: Oat beta-glucan intake is beneficial in preventing, treating, and controlling diabetes, cardiovascular diseases, and improving immune functions.
benefits.journal: Comprehensive Reviews in Food Science and Food Safety

benefits.title: Beta-glucans in the treatment of diabetes and associated cardiovascular risks
benefits.summary: Beta-glucans reduce blood glucose levels, lipids, and hypertension, benefiting the treatment of diabetes and associated complications.

benefits.title: Diets containing soluble oat extracts improve glucose and insulin responses of moderately hypercholesterolemic men and women.
benefits.summary: Soluble beta-glucans in oats improve glucose and insulin responses in moderately hypercholesterolemic men and women.
benefits.journal: The American journal of clinical nutrition

benefits.title: Yeast glucan particles activate murine resident macrophages to secrete proinflammatory cytokines via MyD88- and Syk kinase-dependent pathways.
benefits.summary: Beta-glucan particles activate resident macrophages to secrete proinflammatory cytokines, potentially modulating both innate and adaptive immunity.

benefits.title: Beta-glucan contamination of pharmaceutical products: How much should we accept?
benefits.summary: Beta-glucans have potential immunostimulatory properties and have been used therapeutically as anti-microbial and anti-tumor agents.

benefits.title: Iron(II) binding by cereal beta-glucan.
benefits.summary: Cereal beta-glucans can potentially reduce the bioavailability of iron, which may have health benefits such as cholesterol lowering.

benefits.title: Pure yeast beta-glucan and two types of yeast cell wall extracts enhance cell migration in porcine intestine model
benefits.summary: Beta-Glucans enhance cell migration in a porcine intestinal cell model, potentially reducing inflammation and improving intestinal health.

benefits.title: Beta Glucan: Health Benefits in Obesity and Metabolic Syndrome
benefits.summary: Beta glucan benefits include its beneficial role in insulin resistance, dyslipidemia, hypertension, and obesity, and its potential in food applications.

side effects.title: Glucagon therapy for beta-blocker overdose.
side effects.summary: Glucagon therapy can be effective in treating severe beta-blocker overdose, but side effects include nausea, vomiting, hypokalemia, and hyperglycemia.

side effects.title: Association of immunological disorders in lethal side effect of NSAIDs on beta-glucan-administered mice.
side effects.summary: Combination of beta-glucan and NSAID indomethacin induced lethal toxicity in mice, causing peritonitis by enteric bacteria.

side effects.title: Antihyperglycemic and antinociceptive effects of a commercially produced beta-glucan from Saccharomyces cerevisiae in Swiss albino mice.
side effects.summary: Beta-glucan inhibits increases in blood sugar levels and reduces gastric writhings in mice.

side effects.title: beta(1 leads to 3) Glucan-mediated augmentation of alloreactive murine cytotoxic T-lymphocytes in vivo.
side effects.summary: Beta(1 leads to 3) glucans are chemically defined substances without obvious toxic side effects and may be of potential use to augment in vivo antigen-specific T-cell responses.

side effects.title: The Effects of Orally Administered Beta-Glucan on Innate Immune Responses in Humans, a Randomized Open-Label Intervention Pilot-Study
side effects.summary: Oral beta-glucan did not enhance innate immune responses in humans in this study.

side effects.title: Effects of Bread Yeast Cell Wall Beta-Glucans on Mice with Loperamide-Induced Constipation.
side effects.summary: Beta-glucans can enhance intestinal motility and regulate neurotransmitters and tight junction proteins, potentially helping with constipation complications and dysbiosis.

side effects.title: Medicinal importance of fungal beta-(1-->3), (1-->6)-glucans.
side effects.summary: Beta-glucans are effective in treating diseases like cancer, microbial infections, hypercholesterolaemia, and diabetes by stimulating the immune system.

side effects.title: Beta-glucan ameliorates methotrexate-induced oxidative organ injury via its antioxidant and immunomodulatory effects.
side effects.summary: Beta-glucan may alleviate intestinal and hepatorenal side effects of methotrexate treatment by inhibiting leukocyte apoptosis and oxidative tissue injury.

side effects.title: Immunotoxicity of soluble β-glucans induced by indomethacin treatment
side effects.summary: The combination of beta-glucan and indomethacin induced lethal toxicity in mice by maladjusting the cytokine network.

dosage.title: Oat beta-glucan increases postprandial cholecystokinin levels, decreases insulin response and extends subjective satiety in overweight subjects.
dosage.summary: Beta-glucan improves satiety at a dose of 2.2g, and higher doses decrease subsequent meal intake by more than 400kJ.

dosage.title: Modest doses of beta-glucan do not reduce concentrations of potentially atherogenic lipoproteins.
dosage.summary: A low dosage of beta-glucan (3 g/d) did not significantly reduce total cholesterol or LDL cholesterol in volunteers with plasma cholesterol concentrations representative of a middle-aged UK population.
dosage.journal: The American journal of clinical nutrition

dosage.title: Anticoagulant and antithrombotic actions of a semisynthetic β-1,3-glucan sulfate
dosage.summary: Beta-1,3-glucan sulfate (ED50 = 550 micrograms/kg) has a 32 fold higher concentration (ED50 = 17.2 micrograms/kg) than heparin for similar antithrombotic effects.

dosage.title: Effects of fungal beta-glucans on health - a systematic review of randomized controlled trials.
dosage.summary: The dosage of supplementation with beta-(1  3,1  6)-d-glucans ranged from 2.5 to 1000 mg daily for up to 6.5 months.

dosage.title: Effect of multiple injections of beta-glucan on non-specific immune response and disease resistance in Labeo rohita fingerlings.
dosage.summary: Injections of 10 mg of beta-glucan kg(-1) body wt. for three times can enhance the immune response of fish species under aquaculture.

dosage.title: Effect of beta-glucan on immunity and survival of early stage of Anabas testudineus (Bloch).
dosage.summary: Beta-glucan suspension at 15 mg l(-1) for 3 hours can reduce mortality and increase immunity in A. testudineus spawns.

dosage.title: Glucagon therapy for beta-blocker overdose.
dosage.summary: Doses of glucagon required to reverse severe beta-blockade are 50 micrograms/kg iv loading dose, followed by a continuous infusion of 1-15 mg/h, titrated to patient response.

dosage.title: [Effects of beta glucan in highland barley on blood glucose and serum lipid in high fat-induced C57 mouse].
dosage.summary: Beta glucan in highland barley at a dosage of 2% improves blood glucose and serum lipid levels in high fat diet-induced mice.
dosage.journal: Zhonghua yu fang yi xue za zhi [Chinese journal of preventive medicine]

dosage.title: Antihyperglycemic and antinociceptive effects of a commercially produced beta-glucan from Saccharomyces cerevisiae in Swiss albino mice.
dosage.summary: Beta-glucan at doses of 30, 60, 120, and 240 mg per kg body weight significantly inhibited increases in blood sugar levels and attenuated gastric writhings in mice.

dosage.title: Synergistic effect of nonspecific immunostimulation and antibiotics in experimental peritonitis.
dosage.summary: Glucan 0.1 mg intraperitoneally 24 hours before peritonitis significantly enhanced long-term survival in a model of murine peritonitis.
